ActionCadenceStepVariant.name: ActionCadenceStepVariant
ActionCadenceStepVariant.description: Represents an email template or call script variant associated with an action cadence step. Email and call steps can have up to 3 variants associated so sales teams can compare the engagement results.

ActionCadenceStepId.description: The ID of the related action cadence step.

SplitPercentage.description: The percentage of emails to send or calls to make using this email template or call script variant. The total for all variants must be 100%.

TemplateId.description: The ID of the associated email template or call script.

Type.description: The type of the associated action cadence step.
